title: Person of Interest - Finch introduces the Machine to John Reese (Season 1 Episode 1)
author: Machine of Interest
comment: Finch coded the Machine to send relevant data through official channels. Thanks to Corwin's resources. The irrelevant data is sent by voice. Specifically, Dewey decimal (updated by Finch).
Love the channel name. Wish the machine was as exposed as people are.
The interesting thing is, the machine is global, but finch feels helping the irrelevant list from just a small region is enough. Sorry for the rest of the worlds irrelevant lol
description:
Machine of Interest - A YouTube channel created for the television series "Person of Interest". This YouTube channel displays small clips from the series.
